entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain or snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending near midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Fog patches dissipating near midnight. Rainfall amount 5 mm.
